text:
Mirian Arrua, a nurse at Itaugua National Hospital, is the first person in the country to receive the Sputnik V Covid-19 #vaccine, from Health Minister Julio Mazzoleni (R), in Itaugua, #Paraguay. 📷 epa / EFE / Nathalia Aguilar
